00020 #ifndef __color_scale_included__
00021 #define __color_scale_included__
00022 
00023 #include "real.h"
00024 
00025 #include <vector>
00026 
00027 namespace surfit {
00028 
00029 #define DEFAULT_COLORS 89, 138, 237, 227, 46, 32
00030 
00035 class SURFIT_EXPORT color_scale {
00036 public:
00038         color_scale(REAL from, REAL to, REAL step,
00039                     int r_from, int g_from, int b_from,
00040                     int r_to, int g_to, int b_to);
00041 
00043         ~color_scale();
00044 
00046         void set(REAL from, REAL to, REAL step,
00047                  int r_from, int g_from, int b_from,
00048                  int r_to, int g_to, int b_to);
00050         void add(REAL from, REAL to, REAL step,
00051                  int r_from, int g_from, int b_from,
00052                  int r_to, int g_to, int b_to);
00053 
00055         void get_value(REAL value, int & r, int & g, int & b) const;
00056 
00058         virtual REAL get_value(int pos) const;
00059 
00061         int size() const;
00062 
00064         bool get_color(int pos, int & r, int & g, int &b) const;
00066         void set_color_from(int r, int g, int b);
00068         void set_color_to(int r, int g, int b);
00070         void set_min(REAL min_val);
00072         void set_max(REAL max_val);
00074         void set_step(REAL step_val);
00075 
00077         bool get_params(REAL & from, REAL & to, REAL & step,
00078                         int & r_from, int & g_from, int & b_from,
00079                         int & r_to, int & g_to, int & b_to);
00080 
00082         bool is_default() { return default_cs; };
00084         void set_default(bool val) { default_cs = val; };
00085         
00086 private:
00087 
00089         std::vector<int>  * r_values;
00091         std::vector<int>  * g_values;
00093         std::vector<int>  * b_values;
00095         std::vector<REAL> * values;
00097         bool default_cs;
00098 
00099 };
00100 
00101 SURFIT_EXPORT
00102 color_scale * get_surfit_color_scale();
00103 
00104 SURFIT_EXPORT
00105 void set_color_scale(REAL from, REAL to, REAL step,
00106                      int r1, int g1, int b1,
00107                      int r2, int g2, int b2);
00108 
00109 SURFIT_EXPORT
00110 void set_default_color_scale();
00111 
00112 }; // namespace surfit;
